code: import{createSelector}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var searchTextSelector=function searchTextSelector(state){return state.filters.search;};export var filterStatusSelector=function filterStatusSelector(state){return state.filters.status;};export var filterPrioritiesSelector=function filterPrioritiesSelector(state){return state.filters.priority;};export var todoListSelector=function todoListSelector(state){return state.todoList;};export var todosRemainingSelector=createSelector(todoListSelector,searchTextSelector,filterStatusSelector,filterPrioritiesSelector,function(todoList,searchText,status,priorities){return todoList.filter(function(todo){if(status==='All'){return priorities.length?todo.name.includes(searchText)&&priorities.includes(todo.priority):todo.name.includes(searchText);}return todo.name.includes(searchText)&&(status==='Completed'?todo.completed:!todo.completed)&&(priorities.length?priorities.includes(todo.priority):true);});});
